title: Update 'Review us on Google' link to restaurant reviews URL

requirements.text: Update the 'Review us on Google' section so the Google button/link opens the provided Google Reviews URL for Taste & Tales (replace the current placeholder `SOCIAL_LINKS.google` value used in the footer).

quotes: add this in review us on google section https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=190a96a9d156750b&rlz=1C1YTUH_enIN1199IN1199&sxsrf=ANbL-n4ysIaDCa4jfFuKA9OBq5Xz-yZeMg:1771016063596&si=AL3DRZEsmMGCryMMFSHJ3StBhOdZ2-6yYkXd_doETEE1OR-qObc6Jbzq6uBIArRbHnZOQjhdBvO-cLGAHp0x7B_lQlagt349zrM2Si9ZmDeE9KJ_S6zD6tYcUcRGLg5ufxYmm9gHIcqWoNoaheMh3q1F29aVMy5sqn2q0spdGq68VhoW3gRvMIE%3D&q=Taste+%26+Tales+-+Multicuisine+Restaurant+Reviews&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiqxPL6rNeSAxWwUWcHHbAKJPcQ0bkNegQIOxAF&biw=1280&bih=551&dpr=1.5

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/lib/socialLinks.ts`, `SOCIAL_LINKS.google` equals the exact URL provided by the user.
In the footer 'Social Connect' area (the button labeled 'Review us on Google'), clicking the button opens the provided URL in a new tab (retaining `target="_blank"` and `rel="noopener noreferrer"`).
No user-facing text is changed away from English.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/*` or anything else listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.
Use the Google Reviews URL exactly as provided by the user (do not shorten or replace it).
nonGoals: No redesign of the footer or other social links beyond updating the Google review URL.
